mapper.select: SELECT SHIP_TO_PARTY, SPLIT_APPLY_ID, MILLSHEET_NO FROM CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY WHERE FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO=#{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY.SPLIT_APPLY_ID, CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY.MILLSHEET_NO FROM CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY WHERE FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO=#{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT WARRANTY.SEQ_CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY.nextval AS splitApplyId FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY (SPLIT_APPLY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION, MILLSHEET_NO, FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO, QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, SALE_PARTY, CREATION_TIME, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SHIP_TO_PARTY, STATUS) values (#{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherMillsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{millsheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zkunnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zcpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipToParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT SEQ_CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY.nextval AS splitApplyId FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY
SPLIT_APPLY_ID,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_DT,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_DT,
VERSION,
MILLSHEET_NO,
FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO,
QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE,
SALE_PARTY,
CREATION_TIME,
PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
SHIP_TO_PARTY,
STATUS,
#{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fatherMillsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{millsheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zkunnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zcpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{spiltCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_APPLY
set version = version + 1,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SPLIT_APPLY_ID = #{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
